summary: When user asks 'How much did I spend on groceries last week?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: transaction analysis.
When user asks 'What's my checking account balance?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: account balance query.
When user asks 'Show me my spending by category this month', route to finance_agent. Rationale: category aggregation.
When user asks 'How much did I spend at McDonald's in the last 6 months?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: merchant filter over time window.
When user asks 'How do I build good credit?', route to wealth_agent. Rationale: financial education.
When user says 'I don't know how to budget. Where do I start?', route to wealth_agent. Rationale: budgeting education.
When user asks 'I need help with government assistance programs in Alaska', route to wealth_agent. Rationale: program guidance.
When user asks 'How can I connect my bank accounts?' or 'How do I link my bank?', route to wealth_agent. Rationale: app usage guidance.
When user asks 'Where do I find my memories in the app?' or 'How do I manage my memories?', route to wealth_agent. Rationale: app feature guidance.
When user asks 'How does Vera track my spending?' or 'What can Vera do?', route to wealth_agent. Rationale: app functionality explanation.
When user asks 'How do I create a goal in the app?' or 'Where is the goals section?', route to wealth_agent. Rationale: app navigation guidance.
When user says 'I want to save $1000 for vacation by July 1st', route to goal_agent. Rationale: goals CRUD.
When user asks 'Can I change my savings goal to $1500?', route to goal_agent. Rationale: goal modification.
When user asks 'How am I doing with my savings goal?', route to goal_agent. Rationale: goal status/progress.
When user asks 'What's my overall financial health?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: multi-metric analysis.
When user asks 'What's my debt-to-income ratio?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: DTI computation.
When user asks 'How much should I have in emergency savings?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: emergency fund target.
When user asks 'How are my spending trends this year?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: YTD trend analysis.
When user asks 'Am I spending too much on housing?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: housing % of income.
